title.rendered: Multan vs Lahore, Pakistan T20 League, Final: Today’s Match Prediction, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
Time: Feb 27, 8 PM IST

Venue: Gaddafi Stadium, Lahore

Pitch Report

There were five scores above 160 runs and a total of 38 wickets fell in the qualifiers. The team batting first won two of three games. If anything, the sporting wicket at Lahore provides equal assistance to batters and bowlers.

Teams

Probable XI for Multan: Mohammad Rizwan (c & wk), Shan Masood, Aamer Azmat, Rilee Rossouw, Johnson Charles, Khushdil Shah, David Willey, Asif Afridi, Rumman Raees, Imran Tahir, Shahnawaz Dahani

Probable XI for Lahore: Fakhar Zaman, Abdullah Shafique, Mohammad Hafeez, Kamran Ghulam, Philip Salt (wk), Harry Brook, David Wiese, Samit Patel, Shaheen Afridi (c), Haris Rauf, Zaman Khan

Fantasy Tips

We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Power Players

Not once has Fakhar Zaman failed against Multan this season. In three games, his scores read 76 off 35, 60 off 37, and 63 off 45. Overall, he has fetched 585 runs at 49, sitting comfortably at the top of the runs chart.

At No. 2 is Mohammad Rizwan. His 532 runs have come at a stunning average of 76. More importantly, he has scored four consecutive fifties.

Shan Masood’s second-highest score (83) of the season came against Lahore, eventually winning the Player of the Match award in a successful chase of 207 runs. He, however, couldn’t fire in the qualifiers, scoring 6 runs in 2 games.

Smart Picks

Shaheen Afridi has taken 5 wickets in 3 games against Multan. With a total of 17 wickets, he is the second-highest wicket-taker of the season.

For Multan, the warhorse Imran Tahir has taken the bulk of the wickets. He, however, has been ineffective against Lahore, taking only 2 of his overall 16 wickets in the season.

Shahnawaz Dahani was adjudged the Player of the Match for his match-winning bowling figures of 3 for 19 in the Qualifier last week. Overall, he has bagged 16 wickets at an impressive strike rate of 12.3.

After an inconsistent start to the tournament, Rilee Rossouw has finally found his feet. He has scored three fifties in his last six innings – 65* of 42 being the best against Lahore last week.

Khushdil Shah and Mohammad Hafeez have been handy picks in fantasy cricket, providing vital points with both bat and ball.

Make your debut on the app and get Rs. 1500 as the joining bonus! What are you waiting for? Play fantasy cricket now!

Match Preview

Multan have won two of three games against Lahore this season. Overall, they have lost only once in 11 games, while Lahore have lost 3 of their last 5 games.
